mapper.select: select FROM USER u LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.`user_id` = ur.`user_id` LEFT JOIN role r ON r.`role_id` = ur.`role_id` LEFT JOIN role_permissions rp ON r.`role_id` = rp.`role_id` LEFT JOIN permissions p ON p.`permissions_id` = rp.`permissions_id` where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
